scripts.prepare: rm -Rf dist && mkdir dist && cp source/*.{js,webmanifest} dist/
scripts.build-cmds: npm run html && npm run copy-images && npm run copy-fonts
scripts.build: npm run prepare && npm run build-cmds
scripts.dev: npm run prepare && npm run dev-cmds
scripts.dev-cmds: concurrently --kill-others "npm run copy-images-w" "npm run copy-fonts-w" "npm run html-w" "npm run server"
